short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A solution to your boring new tabs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A dark theme new tab extension that can be customized with a variety of colours and widgets. Get inspired with our rotation of beautiful photos, and enjoy that brief moment with each new tab opened.
